title: How to be a good English speaker and writer - Quora

response.answer_text: I began my writing career by reading as much as possible until I recognized good writing from acceptable. I set a standard which I still strive to reach every day, I had good basic teachers and mentors, I sought out all examples of writers I like Speaking is also a matter of not being afraid to speak. I am terrified about speaking to a group, but I do OK om broadcasts. Writing notes helps. I think if you can be satisfied as a writer, speaking becomes the natural extension
